Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllergui

Class NewDepositController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllergui.NewDepositController
All Implemented Interfaces:
GUIController, javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class NewDepositController
extends java.lang.Object
implements GUIController, javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class represents the controller of the new deposit scene of the GUI application. Implements GUIController and Initializable interface.
Author:
Stefano Fossati
See Also:
GUIController, Initializable

  • Method Details

    • drawDeposit

      public void drawDeposit​(java.util.ArrayList<Resource> depositState, java.util.ArrayList<Resource> marketReceived, boolean isAdditional, java.util.ArrayList<Resource> addDepositType, java.util.ArrayList<Resource> addDepositState, java.util.ArrayList<LeaderCardToClient> leaderCards, boolean isInitial)
      Draws the deposit state and additional deposit state of the player.
      Parameters:
      depositState - The deposit state of the player.
      marketReceived - The resources received from the market that the user has to manage.
      isAdditional - The boolean that indicate if there is an additional deposit active.
      addDepositType - The type of the additional deposit.
      addDepositState - The state of the additional deposit.
      leaderCards - The leader cards of the player
      isInitial - Indicates if the resources arrived are the resources choose in the set up of the match.

    • save

      public void save​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      Manages the shifts of resources that the user done in the deposit.
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - The event of the type MouseEvent.

    • done

      public void done​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Sends the new deposit state to the connection with the server and resets the scene. Finally changes the scene into player view scene.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The event of the type ActionEvent.
